header.name: Airlangga Yudiatama
header.description: üëã Hi, I'm Angga. I'm a software engineer specializing in backend Golang, Python, or Java. I care deeply about building microservices and integration. I'm currently studying machine learning and heading towards to data science. üòÅ

detail: Developed a multi-branch stock opname system with offline mode and sync-to-ERP capability
Deployed across 10+ branches, managing 1,000+ inventory items/month per branch
Supported offline stock checking, allowing staff to scan and store data without internet
Built sync engine to push offline data to the main ERP once connection is restored
Prevented barcode fraud by detecting typed input vs camera-based scan
Reduced audit processing time by ~60%, and decreased manipulation risk by ~90%
Enabled seamless offline-to-online transition with data integrity ensured during sync
Built a web application to manage LPG product sales and inventory across multiple branches
Deployed in 10+ branches, supporting daily transactions and stock monitoring
Implemented custom business rules: max 3 units/month for personal use and 15 units/month for companies
Standardized inventory and sales reports across all branches, improving monitoring accuracy by ~80%
Reduced manual quota-checking time by ~70% through automated business rule logic
Handled 10,000+ LPG transactions monthly, ensuring compliance with regional distribution rules
Collaborated on API development and payment gateway integration for clinic systems using Flutter, Django and PostgreSQL
Fixed critical bugs that improved system stability and reduced error reports from clients by ~60%
Developed reusable Flutter components like notifications with websocket etc., and a hybrid marketplace system to make development progress ~30x faster
Contributed to a 2x faster checkout flow at marketplace using hybrid system and unlocked new revenue opportunities
Contributed to faster development cycles by debugging and refactoring shared components

Built a web dashboard for real-time IoT device monitoring and control, integrated with ThingsBoard. Included multi-level user roles, GPS tracking, sensor and telemetry management, and detailed reporting. Supported over 100 devices with real-time updates, reducing manual checks and improving operational response time by ~40%

Developed a web-based Simkesling system to manage medical waste across hospitals and health centers. Included features for waste categorization, transporter assignment, and reporting per facility. Helping reduce manual data entry and improving reporting accuracy by ~80%
Used by 50+ hospitals and health centers to track and standarization report medical waste efficiently
Improved regulatory compliance and reduced manual reporting effort
Built a Flutter app for hospital queue management, doctor schedules, and emergency features ‚Äî deployed in 3 hospitals across Makassar, Sumatera, and West Java
Integrated with SIMRS APIs to support real-time queue and booking updates
Served 10,000+ patients monthly, enabling remote booking and reducing average wait times by ~40%

items.place: PT Bank Pembiayaan Rakyat Syariah Dinar Ashri
detail: Built a web E-Collateral system for managing bank customer collateral (e.g., jewellery, documents)
Deployed in 10+ branches and used by 50+ users across roles: admin, teller, warehouse, auditor
Enabled detailed tracking by rack, warehouse, and item attributes ‚Äî reducing collateral search time by ~60%
Improved operational visibility and data accuracy with multi-level role-based access
Built a web platform (Lalapan Depok) for the Depok City Health Department to manage food safety training and certification (HSP)
Supported 800+ users annually with multi-user/multi-level roles, including food handlers and admin staff
Enabled online registration, scheduling, and certificate issuance ‚Äî reducing manual processing and improving access
Helped streamline public health certification for 200+ participants per batch, across 4 training batches annually
Built a reconciliation and reversal web tool for PPOB transactions, used internally by BPD DIY.
Automated daily H+1 processing, replacing manual Excel updates with system-integrated syncing
Reduced reconciliation time by ~70% and improved accuracy for thousands of monthly transactions
Enabled staff to filter by date range and payment type, then auto-update records in the core PPOB system

Developed a web-based taxi tracking system with multi-user, multi-level access to manage drivers, vehicles, and transaction history. Integrated with Google Maps and Firebase for real-time GPS tracking of drivers
Used to monitor 100+ airport taxi drivers daily
Enabled dispatch staff to assign orders, monitor vehicle positions, and access reports
Improved driver coordination and reduced passenger wait time by ~40%
Built a mobile app for taxi drivers to receive orders, update readiness status, and share real-time location
Used by drivers to handle 300‚Äì500+ orders weekly
Integrated with Firebase for real-time driver location updates to the web dashboard
Improved driver availability tracking and dispatch response efficiency
Developed a multi-user platform for selling and managing training videos. Trainers can upload content, manage purchases, print receipts, and view sales reports
Targeted for 20+ trainers and 100+ users with an expected 500+ annual transactions
Improved training delivery and content sales
Trainers can upload new training videos, while users can purchase and stream content
Designed to support 200‚Äì300+ video views per month with real-time playback
Laid the foundation for mobile-first digital learning and scalable content delivery
Built a reconciliation and reversal web tool for PPOB transactions, used internally by the company.
Automated daily H+1 processing, replacing manual Excel updates with system-integrated syncing
Supported importing Excel files from multiple third-party vendors to streamline reconciliation inputs
Reduced reconciliation time by ~70% and improved accuracy for thousands of monthly transactions
Enabled staff to filter by date range and payment type, then auto-update records in the core PPOB system
Built a desktop SPPD (official travel document) management app using Python and PyQt
Deployed in a local office network, used by 2-5 staff for creating SPPD, receipts, and reports
Enabled automatic handling of yearly closings with separate database management and backup support
Reduced travel document processing time by ~60% and improved accuracy by replacing manual workflows
Developed a web-based PPOB system for processing PDAM water bill payments in Bas Sampang
Used by 1‚Äì2 admins to process ~500+ customer payments monthly
Allowed receipt printing and report generation, replacing manual tracking
Improved transaction speed and reduced errors, enabling ~70% faster payment reconciliation
Built a multi-user invoicing platform for small businesses to streamline billing
Used by 2+ user generating 1000+ invoices annually
Enabled sending invoices with PDF attachments via email and tracking receipts
Reduced manual creating invoicing time by ~60% and improved payment tracking accuracy
Developed a payroll and HR platform with multi-level access for employee data and salary calculations
Managed payroll for 20+ employees monthly
Automated tax, overtime, and allowance calculations, and generated payroll summary reports
Reduced manual payroll workload by ~75%, improving payout accuracy and timeliness
Developed a multi-user web platform for managing and tracking sales activity
Integrated with Mapbox for real-time sales location tracking and route visualization
Used by 10+ salespeople and managers across multiple place
Features included monthly sales planning, revenue dashboards (monthly & historical), user and document management, and photo-based proof submission
Reduced sales monitoring time by ~60% and improved report accuracy across teams
Built a mobile app for sales teams to plan monthly targets, upload reports, and ensure location authenticity
Used by 10+ field staff, submitting 100+ proof photos and reports monthly
Included location fraud detection to verify on-site presence
Synced directly with the web dashboard for unified planning and performance tracking
Improved sales monitoring efficiency by ~60% and enabled accurate field activity reporting
I continue build CMS(Content Management System) Mecash, this continued project from my internship. I just change framework from java spring to python flask and from sql server to mysql.
Built an internal Q&A and knowledge-sharing forum similar to StackOverflow
Designed for 50‚Äì100 internal users across departments to ask questions, give answers, and upvote solutions
Helped reduce repetitive questions and accelerated onboarding by ~40%
Improved internal documentation and knowledge retention in the organization
Assisted in converting a desktop-based customer service system into a responsive web app
Migrated core modules such as customer lookup, ticketing, and transaction
Improved accessibility for ~20‚Äì30 CS staff, enabling remote access and reducing support request handling time
Contributed to UI modernization and backend logic adaptation during web migration phase
Developed a CMS to manage market banners, content, and promo material for the Mecash mobile app
Used by marketing/admin teams to manage 100+ pieces of content monthly
Integrated with Mecash App to instantly reflect updated content and promotions
Reduced marketing campaign update time by ~70% through centralized CMS and automation
